pages.text: $(l)CHANGES IN HELL MODE - ALPHEM: $(br)$()+ Enhanced armor, attack damage, and health. $(br)$()+ They now spawn with stronger weapons, like a diamond sword or an iron axe. $(br)$()+ There is now a little chance for them to spawn with a totem of undying in it's off-hand.

$(l)CHANGES IN HELL MODE - BELLOPHGOLEM: $(br)$()+ Enhanced armor, attack damage, and health. $(br)$()+ Increased berserk mode buffs. $(br)$()+ Increased berserk mode buffs. $(br)$()+ Increased projectile damage and explosion radius. $(br)$()+ Now shoots 2 projectiles on berserk mode.
